players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the detective and Diana is mafioso. Be careful, Diana knows I'm onto her."
Bob: "Thank Alice, will watch Diana. Anybody else?"
Diana: "Working together, we can solve this. Alice, keep an eye on me."
Diana: "Will cooperate, Alice. Stay alert."
You: "Watch Diana closely. She knows I'm the detective."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on both Diana and Alice. Stay cautious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
